text:
@TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump Germany: Coronavirus down 90% since spring.

France: Coronavirus down 87% since spring.

New Zealand: Coronavirus down 100% since spring.

USA: Coronavirus UP 218% since June…

…but Melania Trump is leading a renovation of the Rose Garden.

Marie Antoinette stuff right there.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
